connector.name: DIAM_SCAP2_SM
connector.description: 2-step charging. Do not change NB host! After load test return host to host-specific marker: DIAM_SM_Browser

Request.requestXML: <RequestAVPs> <command>272</command> <application>4</application> <avp> <name>Session-Id</name> <type>string</type> <value>%SESSION_ID%</value> </avp> <avp> <name>Origin-Host</name> <type>string</type> <value>%HOST_NAME%</value> </avp> <avp> <name>CC-Request-Type</name> <type>uint32_t</type> <value>%CC-Request-Type%</value> </avp> <avp> <name>CC-Request-Number</name> <type>uint32_t</type> <value>%CC-Request-Number%</value> </avp> <avp> <name>Auth-Application-Id</name> <type>uint32_t</type> <value>4</value> </avp> <avp> <name>Event-Timestamp</name> <type>uint32_t</type> <value>%NOW%</value> </avp> <avp> <name>Subscription-Id</name> <type>group</type> <value> <avps> <avp> <name>Subscription-Id-Type</name> <type>uint32_t</type> <value>0</value> </avp> <avp> <name>Subscription-Id-Data</name> <type>string</type> <value>%Subscription-Id-MSISDN%</value> </avp> </avps> </value> </avp> <avp> <name>Service-Context-Id</name> <type>string</type> <value>SCAP_V.2.0@ericsson.com</value> </avp> <avp> <name>Service-Identifier</name> <type>uint32_t</type> <value>%Service-Identifier%</value> </avp> <avp> <name>Requested-Service-Unit</name> <type>group</type> <value> <avps> <avp> <name>CC-Service-Specific-Units</name> <type>uint64_t</type> <value>%CC-Service-Specific-Units%</value> </avp> </avps> </value> </avp> <avp> <name>3GPP-MS-TimeZone</name> <type>octetstring</type> <value>8000</value> </avp> <avp optional="1"> <name>Service-Parameter-Info-Integer</name> <type>group</type> <value> <avps>
